reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the Tropicana for 2 nights. The motel is well located, very quiet and less than 10 minutes walk into the main street of Cowes. The rooms are clean and reasonably sized. The hosts were friendly and helpful. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Good motel

reviews.text: My friend and I made our first trip to Phillip Island and were delighted with the Tropicana. I booked it months in advance with a small deposit. They responded promptly and courteously to my enquiries and were very welcoming and helpful when we were there - and their suggestion to eat dinner at Pino's couldn't have been better: I haven't had a steak that good in years.
reviews.title: Highly recommended!

reviews.text: The room was what you'd expect of a motel: basic decor (brick walls, clean carpet) beds, ample storage space, a television (which we didn't use as it was an overnight stay and we were out at the Penguin Parade), fridge, shower and two basins. Everything worked, although beware, if you tilt the shower head to angle the water over you instead of over the back wall, it will go all over the floor.
reviews.title: Good for an overnight stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were there at a quiet time, I think; the MotoGP was over, it was a Thursday night and not yet the high summer season. There seemed to be quite a few people staying, but not large and noisy groups or families, so there was no racket. I can't comment on the breakfast (Continental or the bacon-and-eggs variety are available) as we ate at a cafe.
reviews.title: Comfortable and welcoming helpful staff - convenient for Penguin Parade

reviews.text: The location is very convenient, five minutes' slow (and uphill) walk to Cowes shopping centre. I thought it was excellent value and would definitely stay again if I should return to the Island.
reviews.title: Just convenient

reviews.text: Loved my stay at the tropicana motel. Highly recommended for those travelling to cowes. We also enjoyed the in room spa.
reviews.title: Great Stay!

reviews.text: Rooms were clean and tidy, and Jim was very helpful t reception.
reviews.title: Great Hospitality, Good location, Good Value

reviews.text: We enjoyed a nice steak dinner t the restaurant which also had quick service and value meals.
reviews.title: Great place, very clean

reviews.text: This is a Motor Inn, so don't expect fancy stuff.
reviews.title: Went to Phillips Island and the Penguin Parade and found the Tropicana.
Good value
reviews.text: But the staff/owner/inn keepers are very friendly and gave great service. We ordered In Room breakfast one morning and it was delivered piping hot through a little hatch at the side of the door. SO cute! :) I had a chat with the owners and they actually went and bought the croissants fresh that morning! :)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I recently spent a night at this motel. The location is quiet with a very clean room. I suffer from back problems but the bed was comfortable.
reviews.title: Ideal location

reviews.text: No complaints apart from the terrible weather!
reviews.title: Phillip Island, well with a visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cowed is a lovely resort with so much to do close by. Whether you are visiting the Penguin Parade, the Grand Prix, Koala Reserve, or just love beaches......do plan to stay a few days.
reviews.title: Luxury for backpackers on Phillip Island

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Tropicana Motel Rooms are spacious and just the ticket.
reviews.title: Good Overnight Stay

reviews.text: We stayed for one night in a double motel room back at the end of January. Mainly I can only echo the thoughts of other reviewers to say that this is a really lovely place to stay whilst on Phillip Island and is a great base to explore from. The location in Cowes is excellent and the town itself was lovely and seemed like the best place to be based in on the island. Its just a 15 minute drive to the Koala Conservation Centre and about 20 minutes to the Penguin Parade. I only wish we'd been staying longer so we could have explored the town itself and the surrounding beaches. The room itself was very spacious and clean - the bed was super comfy and being backpackers it was a bit of luxury for us to have a TV, a big ensuite bathroom, fridge and tea/coffee making facilities. The owners were really friendly and helpful and made sure we knew where we were going to get to the Penguin Parade etc. My only additional comment would be that although the motel seemed good value for Phillip Island, it was a bit of a shame that everything else was an additional cost (e.g. breakfast, wifi, spa bath) as we were already at the very top end of our budget. I can understand that breakfast would be an extra cost, but it would have been nice to have been given even a limited wifi allowance. But overall, a really great place to stay that I would definitely recommend and we would love to return for a slightly longer stay.
reviews.title: Convenient location, friendly and helpful managers, good value

reviews.text: On Philip Island, what I would say a cheap but great place to stay in! 20 mins drive to Penguin Parade , 25 mins drive to Nobbies. 2 mins drive to the nearest Woolworths (supermarket). Really spacious room, clean, comfortable and nice. Staff there are excellent in service! Quite a popular place to stay. Was there on a weekday and was almost full house! Free parking available just outside your unit. Overall a wonderful stay!
reviews.title: Wonderful stay with great friendly staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We made a one night stop here in order to see to see the Penguin Parade.
reviews.title: Just what we booked

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We selected the Tropicana based on other Tripadvisor comments and would confirm that this establishment provided value for money and service, indeed it ticked all the boxes.
reviews.title: We would stay again

reviews.text: We received friendly helpful advice from reception and for the short time we were there found everything in the above average category.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay in a well located motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly and helpful check-in. Clean and comfortable room. A more spacious room than usual. The bathroom was a little run down. For example, the end of the towel rail had rusted. We got a very cheap rate over the Internet which made it good value. We would stay there again.
reviews.title: Very accomodating people here!
